title: Can I give JEE paper after scoring less than 75 percent by giving CBSE improvement exam? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes ,you can give JEE. And if you dream for NITs then this is possible only if you:- Apply for the improvement exam(CBSE) and work hard for boards and JEE both. If you able to improve your boards above 75% and mark your JEE marks above 160 then you can easily be getting into NITs. This is another golden chance for your dream.
You just need to pass 12th board exam to take JEE , but to be eligible to join IIT/NIT/IIIT you must score 75%,65%(SC/ST) or should be in top 20 percentile in your respective 12th board exam .
